fieldDescription: Show price / Shortage / Excess indicators in the market screens

Setting this to true makes the mod much less intrusive - showing indicators only when excess or shortage exists and forgoing quantity indication and price guides. Set it to true if you think there is too much stuff happening on your market screen.
Set to true to add an indicator to weapon & fighters that you know the blueprint of.
Set to true to add an indicator to weapons & fighters that you do NOT know the blueprint of.
